analyst.response: Analysis complete. Project brief created with key requirements identified.

files.content:
# Project Brief

## Overview
This project requires implementation of 5 core features.

## Key Requirements
- User authentication
- Dashboard display
- Data export
- Settings management
- Notification system

pm.response: PRD generated with 5 functional requirements and acceptance criteria.

files.content:
# Product Requirements Document

## Functional Requirements
- FR-1: User authentication
- FR-2: Dashboard display
- FR-3: Data export
- FR-4: Settings management
- FR-5: Notification system

architect.response: Architecture designed. System components defined with clear boundaries.

files.content:
# Architecture Document

## Components
- Frontend: React + Vite
- Backend: Node.js + Fastify
- Database: In-memory for MVP

# Story 1: User Authentication

## Acceptance Criteria
- User can log in
- User can log out
- Session persists

# Story 2: Dashboard Display

## Acceptance Criteria
- Dashboard loads
- Data displays correctly
- Updates in real-time

# Story 3: Data Export

## Acceptance Criteria
- User can export data
- Export formats supported
- Export completes successfully

# Story 4: Settings Management

## Acceptance Criteria
- User can update settings
- Settings persist
- Settings apply immediately

# Story 5: Notification System

## Acceptance Criteria
- Notifications display
- Notifications are dismissible
- Notification history available

developer.response: Implementation complete. Code files created with tests.
